#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int gcd( int a, int b ) {
	
	if( ( a % b ) == 0 )
		return b;
	else
		return gcd( b, ( a % b ) );
}

void DivByGcd( int& c, int& d ) {
	
	int g = gcd( c, d );
	c /= g;
	d /= g;
}

int NCR( int n, int k ) {
	
	int i, toMult, toDiv, num = 1, deno = 1;
	
	for( i = k;i >= 1;i-- ) {
		
		toMult = ( n - k + i );
		toDiv = i;
		
		DivByGcd( toMult, toDiv );
		DivByGcd( toMult, deno );
		DivByGcd( toDiv, num );
		
		num *= toMult;
		deno *= toDiv;
	}
	
	return ( num / deno );
}

int main() {
	
	int n, m, t;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d\n%d", &n, &m );
		printf("%d\n", NCR( m+n, n ) );
	}
	return 0;
}
